news.title: Top 10 Changes That Impacted Google My Business in 2020
news.description: Highlights include adding suggested categories for GMB Products, launching features related to COVID-19, adding a “more hours” option, and adding the ability to flag user profiles.

news.title: Google Goes Deep On Dupe Detection & Canonicalization
news.description: To detect duplicate content, Google reduces the content into a hash or checksum and then compares the checksums, which allows it to catch near-duplicates as well as exact duplicates.

news.title: Some Google Algorithm Updates Are Jarring & Others More Gradual
news.description: Certain updates have resulted in huge changes in rankings within a few days, but more recent updates result in a gradual impact over weeks, which is the pace that Google often prefers.

news.title: What is Google AMP and Do I Need It for SEO?
news.description: Benefits of AMP include faster loading speeds, increased website engagement, improved ranking and traffic, lower bounce rates, increased ad views, and higher click-through rates.

news.title: Google Passage Ranking - Martin Splitt Answers Questions
news.description: The new ranking system will help users with long form content by ranking a small section of an article, but it will not require adjustments by publishers except possibly clarifying headings.

news.title: Is Your Website at Risk for an ADA Accessibility Lawsuit?
news.description: All industries must comply with website accessibility laws, but certain industries face greater risks, such as real estate, health care, autos, education, finance, food, and e-commerce.
